definitions.explanation_en: A given name, typically feminine, used in English-speaking countries. It is often a diminutive form of names like Amanda or Mandana.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个常见的女性名，多用于英语国家，通常是 Amanda 或 Mandana 等名字的昵称或缩略形式。
definitions.example_en: Mandy is the new project manager at our office.
definitions.example_cn: 曼迪是我们办公室的新项目经理。
